title: Radical Love 2: Loving Ourselves into Healing (2020-08-19)
itunes:title: Radical Love 2: Loving Ourselves into Healing
description: Radical Love 2: Loving Ourselves into Healing(2020-08-19) - Radical love sees and cherishes the sacred that lives through all beings.  In this talk, we’ll look at the barrier to loving the life that is right here—what we call self—and how we can call on the light and warmth of awareness to awaken that love.
